      • Samurai

        public Samurai(SpriteSheet spriteSheet,
               int x,
               int y,
               Grid grid,
               int id,
               int xRotID,
               int yRotID,
               int type)
        creates samurai enemy with advanced characteristics
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - SpriteSheet object with animation tiles
        x - x coordinate location
        y - y coordinate location
        grid - movement grid
        id - enemy ID
        xRotID - x rotational position ID
        yRotID - y rotational position ID
        type - class of enemy samurai
